item.title: Auto Recurrent Agent
item.description:
This is perhaps very relevant to Noam Brown’s multi step reasoning and O1

#idea I want to build my own RAG search in Obsidian Nice :D

#idea agentic LLM. Give it access to a bunch of functions and let it decide how it wants to evaluate stuff… maybe it can be function calls using $(func()) and we pass the result of evaluations in the text… -> it can dump it’s own memory to files… and basically trace the links later if it wants. we will also give it a scratchpad memory…
